Share your way

Let your friends or family know youâ€™re here. Share your position during your outdoor adventures in real time. Share meeting points. Find out where the always late John is located.

Play Store

Features

Rooms

An unlimited number of people can join the room and share their location..

Maps

Multiple types of maps available: OpenStreetMap, OpenCycleMap, Outdoor Map and Google Maps.

Fast share

Download app and click 2 buttons - one for start sharing location and one for sharing link - and your friends will easily find you.

Security

Your data is protected: we do not collect it at all. Only anonymized geodata is stored on the server.

No Ads

App doesn't contain any ads.

Battery friendly

The application uses geolocation only when it is needed. No battery drain anymore.

Please leave questions, bug reports, or comments on the issue tracker:
